articles.author: Kaleem Aftab
articles.title: The long history of racism in war movies - BBC News
articles.description: As Netflix releases Spike Lee’s film Da 5 Bloods, about African-American Vietnam veterans, it’s a reminder of how profoundly Hollywood has whitewashed conflict, writes Kaleem Aftab.
articles.content: In the mid-1980s, Oliver Stones Platoon followed in Apocalypse Nows footsteps by offering a slightly more sophisticated depiction of the conflict. It portrayed racial divides amongst American troops,… [+2366 chars]
